page.title: 12 Clubs in Polstead
page.content: THE PLAYGROUP was started in 1980 for children from two and a half years old.The meetings are on three mornings a week and the children join in social play,develop motor skills with art activities and constructional toys.The children also visit the village school. THE OVER-SIXTIES CLUB,formed over twenty years ago,also meets in the Village Hall.People from all over the village enjoy a not too serious game of whist,have tea and biscuits,and a game of Bingo with a prize for everyone. There is a 20P subscription and Whist drives and a bazaar are held to raise further funds.An outing to the sea-side is held in early September.The elderly rely upon willing volunteers to transport them to the Village Hall.
